pageTitle: Utilities Previously Under ServerRoot/shared/bin (Sun Directory Server Enterprise Edition 7.0 Upgrade and Migration Guide)
textBeforeTable: ServerRoot/shared/bin Table 6–4 Tools Previously Under The following tables describes the new location of the administrative tools previously under ServerRoot/shared/bin. Note that as a result of the change to the administrative framework, some of these tools have been deprecated. Utilities Previously Under ServerRoot/shared/bin Next: Certificate and Key Files Previous: Plug-Ins Previously Under ServerRoot/plugins Sun Directory Server Enterprise Edition 7.0 Upgrade and Migration Guide Changes to the Installed Product Layout  > Utilities Previously Under ServerRoot/shared/bin Chapter 6 Architectural Changes in Directory Server Since Version 5.2  > Part II Migrating Directory Server Enterprise Edition 5.2 to Version 7.0  > Sun Directory Server Enterprise Edition 7.0 Upgrade and Migration Guide  > Documentation Home  >
